content:
That sounds amazing! A s'mores station is a great idea - it's a fun and interactive way to end the meal, and who can resist the combination of chocolate, marshmallows, and graham crackers?

I'm glad to hear that your lake house trip was relaxing and enjoyable. It sounds like you and your family really made the most of your time together. Sometimes, it's the simple, laid-back moments that end up being the most memorable.

I think your barbecue party is shaping up to be a great success! With classic sides like coleslaw and baked beans, and a fun s'mores station for dessert, your guests are sure to have a blast. Don't forget to relax and enjoy the party yourself - after all, it's about spending time with the people you care about, not about stressing over every little detail.

If you have any more questions or need further recommendations, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I hope your party planning goes smoothly, and I'm sure you'll have a wonderful time with your friends and family!
